item.description:
GenDu "The Gentleman's Duel" is a trading card game where you play as a gentleman in The world of the Gents. You can challenge other gentleman to a duel to test their might and prove your own. The gentlemen set up dungeons and battle to the death.In the game players build their respective dungeons while the objective is to get one of their nouns (also referred to as creatures) through the opposing player's dungeon whilst destroying anything in its path. Both players build dungeons and then try to conquer each other, which makes for an intense experience.

Gentlemen duel for many reasons; honor, respect, recognition, fancy shoes, the love of a fair maiden, crisp bacon, a good shawarma, or to maybe one day be a
Master Gentleman.


 Gentlemen can build their own deck of 50 cards and duel against other Gentleman.
 You can also purchase Starter Decks, which are a built deck of 50 cards ready to play. All Starter Decks are random.
 Or you can purchase Booster Packs and build your own deck from scratch.
 Trade with your friends to get cards that will help your deck and increase your odds of winning
 Or try and collect all 136 different cards in the series.


The cards in a Gentleman's deck are the powers and defense they have at their disposal to defeat any challenger. Build wisely.

For more information on how to play GenDu The Gentleman's Duel. Check out our Game Play Video on our Rules page.

You can also create your own GenDu cards!!!

GenDu The Gentleman's Duel is the first and only trading card game ( TCG ) where all cards released in every series are created by the players.


 Every Booster pack and Starter deck comes with blank GenDu cards.
 Starter decks have 3 blank cards and Booster packs have 1. 
 Players draw their card ideas on the cards provided and Send Them In.
 Players can also use our Card Maker online to submit cards.
 The cards are posted on our Facebook page for votes.
 The cards with the highest votes are printed into the next series.
 Author of the card has their name printed on the card
 Author also gets first copy of the printed card sent to them for FREE!


This is what sets GenDu apart from any other TCG. Now for the first time players have an opportunity to be a part of the game creation. Furthermore with player input and collaboration, GenDu can will always remain fresh and interesting. We welcome all players to send in as many ideas as they want so that they have a better chance of one of them being picked to be in the next release of GenDu.

The Gentleman's Duel awaits....

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
